price: Alif Laam Raa tun keewwattoota kitaabichaatiifi Qur’aana (waan hunda) ifa baasaa ta’eeti.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
